name: typedoc-tutorial-basic
description: demonstrate why is much better to represent events by enforcing the @name tag using the [typedoc-plugin-respect-name-tag plugin

scripts.test: echo "No tests here yet, it's fine" && exit 0
scripts.doc: yarn run doc-tut &&yarn run doc-typedoc&& yarn run doc-docco && yarn run doc-markdown
scripts.doc-tut-all: yarn run doc-tut && yarn run doc-docco
scripts.doc-tut-watch: CMD="yarn run doc-tut-all"; eval $CMD ; while true ; do  watch -g -d "cat src/tutorial.hbs" && eval $CMD ; done

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
